title: Digital Cards
body:
So I wanted to buy a $10 RP Card for the store and I did online.
I went on amazon and bought a digital rp card by Riot Games (https://www.amazon.com/League-Legends-10-Gift-Card/dp/B014X427WM/ref=dsvrt_myd_asin_block)
After I checked out, I went on league to redeem the code and this pops up https://gyazo.com/772edb418845b1b88a0c2346745e40ff

I am really pissed right now and hope I could redeem my card and get my RP otherwise I just got ripped off...

https://gyazo.com/56d5fd9b9facdf21242077d5cfada6d4

replies.body: When you're putting in that code, make sure you're entering it in the Pre-Paid section and **don't** use the REP-US part of it. If it's still not working, shoot our billing guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help a little more there!
